resources.string: Do you want to save the route \"%s\"?
The GPS provider is disabled. The app will not run without it. Do you want to activate it?
Write the name of the route
The route is too small Continue to save screen anyway?
The route has not been saved
The name of the route cannot be empty
Save, reuse and share your hiking, running and cycling routes.

Author:
	Diego Alonso Gonzalez
	Sergio Modino Catalán
	Antonio Pesquera Rodriguez
	Francisco Javier Reoyo Carrón

En colaboración con Felix Prieto, profesor de la Escuela de Ingeniería Informática de la Universidad de Valladolid.
Haven\'t try SportRoutes yet? Click bellow!

This is a little guide for general hightlights of the app SportRoutes.\nYou can navigate across the app by using left menu, which can be deployed swinging your mouse from left to right or pressing top left button.

This action starts a new route. Tapping start on the screen will start to record your position, creating a new route while moving through your place. Be sure to enable Tracking position in your phone.\nAt the end, the app will tell you how many secs took to you to finish your new route. You can save the route by pressing Yes to Save pop up and be sure to enjoy your route in the future :)

This action allow you to reuse a saved route. You can repeat funny momments following previous routes.

On construction at the moment.
This action allow the user to enable / disable some options for the app.
What can we tell to you of that action.. You\'re already in it :D\n\n
Allow the app to show a weather prediction
Allow the app to show a temperature prediction
Notify the user when abandon the selected route
Wellcome to SportRoutes!\nYour favorite route tracker
You can not save a route with less than two points.
